title: 【格雷科技服】拿东西点机器崩溃
author: 口水鸭鸭鸭
txt_content:
问题：只要不是空手点机器，服务器就崩溃，单机也是这样子

=============================================
---- Minecraft Crash Report ----
// There are four lights!
Time: 9/5/15 1:29 PM
Description: Exception in server tick loop
java.lang.IllegalAccessError: The Enum 'Upgrade_SteamEngine' has not been set to an Item at this time!
 at gregtech.api.enums.ItemList.get(ItemList.java:539)
 at gregtech.api.enums.ItemList.isStackEqual(ItemList.java:534)

 at net.minecraft.server.MinecraftServer.run(MinecraftServer.java:658)
 at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)

replies.author: qwerard
replies.txt_content: 建议把forge版本提高，把格雷版本升级
